name: crewless
content:

without a crew (= a group of people who work together to operate a ship): These crewless submarines could be used to provide vital information about changes in ocean temperatures. I had a yacht but I was crewless.
More examplesFewer examplesThere was no danger because the vessel was crewless, a robot ship that can stay at sea indefinitely using wind and solar power. The crew abandoned ship, and the crewless captain beached the vessel a few hundred yards offshore.They are developing autonomous ships with the goal of making 50% of their fishing fleet crewless.
